oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Effect of Ascorbic Acid on Hematology, Serum Biochemistry and Health of Dairy Calves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Seifi, H. A.
Mohri, M.
Delaramy, M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ascorbic acid
calf health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Results showed that ascorbic acid supplementation at first 3 weeks of age has no significant effects on calf health and hematological and biochemical parameters. It is highly likely that significant results would be obtained in colostrum-deprived calves or in stressful conditions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2007; 287
